name: Kick Lucifer's Ass - Jam Version
description:
The controls are the same but the enemies are WAY more aggressive! The only way you'll survive is by making frequent use of the super jump. Look out for Lucifer's flames when he's at half health. This one is actually quite hard to beat, good luck!

Shoot: Left click

Fire mana bomb: Right click.

Jump: Space. You get a super-jump every 3 seconds.

Swap Guns: E

You can also waste mana bombs to blow back demons, but be careful, ammo is limited.
